attributes.action: Make BT (British Telecom) provide a professional service to their Customers
attributes.background:
I have personally been waiting for over 9 months now for BT to provide me with a landline and broadband service.  For the past 9 months, they have constantly lied on every communication.

I have lodged the complaint with the Ombudsman service, who have done nothing to help.

rejection.details:
This isn't something that the UK Government or Parliament could do. BT is not a public body.

You can find out about complaining about BT here:

http://bt.custhelp.com/app/answers/detail/a_id/10789/~/how-do-i-make-a-complaint-to-bt%3F
